name: Crankies Workshop: Bozzbot Assembly
description: Crankies Workshop is a true or false question game with a colorful and friendly atmosphere. Crankie needs help assembling his new order of Bozzbot's and he needs you to answer the knowledge machines questions to keep it assembling the robots.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Win 7 32-bit or higher Процессор: 2.0 ghz or higher Оперативная память: 500 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 500 Megs VRAM DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 500 MB
